DOC.detailed_description: This study three stage . Stage 1 : Safety initial bioavailability Entera 's oral EP101 adult male healthy volunteer . ( SA-BA ) Stage 2 : Assessment bioavailability safety Entera 's oral EP101 adult male healthy volunteer . ( SA-BA-PK-PD ) Stage 3 : Safety , PK , PD final dose Entera 's oral PTH ( 1 - 34 ) adult healthy male female volunteer . ( SA-BA-PK-PD )
